name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, a man pulled out the national flags on the roadside one by one and threw them on the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The CIA has released a Chinese video to instruct Chinese netizens on how to contact the CIA while ensuring their own safety.
The safety advice in the video also applies to submitting articles to Teacher Li.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: More safety tips:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Tiananmen plainclothes team during the National Day holiday

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 3, two Chinese tourists who were causing trouble were forced to leave the country by the Taiwan Immigration Agency in accordance with the law. The Mainland Affairs Council stated that after entering the country, mainland Chinese people are not allowed to make remarks that are harmful to Taiwan's autonomy, and are not allowed to engage in improper behavior that violates the principle of equal dignity.
If mainland Chinese people come to Taiwan and commit illegal or irregular acts that endanger national security and social stability or undermine national sovereignty and equal dignity, the government will immediately and seriously deal with them in accordance with the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 1, Wu Jianghao, Chinese Ambassador to Japan, participated in the National Day Parade in Yokohama Chinatown.
The banner behind him read: "Hu Youping (the victim of the Japanese school in Suzhou), Shen Hangping (the victim of the Japanese school in Shenzhen), Xi Jinping, those who should leave have not left."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a piece of news went viral on Chinese social media platforms, saying that "Russian 35-year-old female pilot Evelyn carried a nuclear bomb across three NATO countries, captured an American F16 fighter jet alive and escorted it back to her country." Netizens praised this "Russian female pilot" in the comment section, but some people discovered that the female pilot in the picture was Pakistan's first female fighter pilot Ayesha Farooq, and the story of "capturing an American pilot alive" was also fictitious.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 2 (Released) It was reported online that a user named "xjp198964" posted anti-Taliban remarks on the Minecraft Chinese forum. In the article, he listed Xi Jinping's crimes and called on the military and police, entrepreneurs, media, college students and other groups across the country not to become accomplices of the Communist Party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 29, according to Vietnamese media reports, a fishing boat carrying 10 Vietnamese fishermen was attacked by Chinese ships while fishing near the Xisha Islands. 40 Chinese crew members beat the Vietnamese fishermen with iron rods and robbed about 20,000 US dollars of fishing gear, causing at least three people to have fractures. The Vietnamese Ministry of Foreign Affairs condemned this brutal behavior on October 3. China said that Vietnam was illegally fishing without permission, and the on-site action was professional and restrained, and there were no casualties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on October 3, last month, a 33-year-old Chinese citizen holding a student visa in Australia was accused of pouring hot coffee on a 9-month-old baby boy in a Brisbane park, causing severe burns to the baby boy. The student then flew out of the country. Australian police confirmed that the man's identity has been exposed and police officers will be looking for the suspect worldwide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a 23-year-old Chinese man stabbed three children in Zurich, which caused heated discussions. Some netizens used domestic translation software to translate foreign English reports, but the information that the arrested man was Chinese was not translated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, the Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office published an article stating (Figure 2) that “One country, two systems is a great innovation unprecedented in history. Under this policy, residents of Hong Kong and Macau want to enjoy more extensive democratic rights and freedoms than at any time in history.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, several lawyers revealed that the detention centers are overcrowded this year, and many places plan to expand. Some detention centers originally accommodated 12 people in a room, but now they can accommodate up to 20 people. As for the reasons for the overcrowding, lawyers said that the economic pressure has led to the frequent occurrence of new crimes, the crackdown, and some behaviors that did not originally constitute a crime may now be convicted. Netizens replied: The 60-year-old aunt downstairs was detained for playing mahjong. According to data released by the Supreme Court, 788,000 defendants were sentenced in the first half of the year, an increase of 8.47% year-on-year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 3, the author "Mr. Shan" commented on the incident of "a man in Hangzhou was denounced for wearing clogs". He said that if Duke Wen of Jin, 2,000 years ago, came to West Lake wearing clogs, he would have encountered the same saliva, and Xie Lingyun, the inventor of Xie Gong clogs, and Li Bai, who wore Xie Gong clogs, would not have been immune to attacks. "How can the patriotic thieves today be so stupid?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the US Central Intelligence Agency released a video on social media platforms to guide users on how to contact them safely. In response, many Chinese netizens asked in the comment section how to join. "How to contact, where to sign up?" "How many insurances and funds does the CIA have, can the salary be paid on time?" "Does anyone know how much money is paid?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, Japanese media reported that many Chinese tourists traveled to Japan during the National Day holiday. It is reported that during this year's National Day holiday, Japan is the most popular overseas tourist destination, followed by Thailand and South Korea.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 3, several posters celebrating the 75th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China were vandalized in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. Pictures showed that the words "Chinese People" on the posters were crossed out. The police have classified this series of cases as criminal damage and have opened an investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 9 am on October 3, a small passenger ship was hit and capsized by a crab boat at Qushan Central Fishing Port in Daishan County, Zhoushan City. Video showed that a large number of passengers on the passenger ship fell into the water. According to insiders, there were more than 60 passengers on the ship. The accident caused one death and eight people missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: List of dead and missing persons

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 3, Henan. The man once again entered the Apple store holding a Huawei tri-fold phone, and continued to dance and shout despite the staff's obstruction and the surprised eyes of the surrounding customers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 3, Guangxi. Veterans from Shangsi County came to the local Veterans Affairs Bureau to fight for pension benefits. Veterans said, "We once defended our country and participated in the Sino-Vietnamese War."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, the FBI indicted five Chinese students on Tuesday for roaming and snooping around the Joint Operations Center at Camp Grayling in Michigan in August last year. Afterwards, they lied to U.S. officials about their intentions and tried to delete photos and cover up their whereabouts. In addition, the FBI found that the five had booked a room at a nearby motel a week before the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 2, Ren Zhiqiang's daughter Ren Xinyi published an open letter to Xi Jinping.
The letter stated that Ren Zhiqiang's prostate condition worsened and he also suffered from asthma. He is currently suffering from pain but has never been allowed to undergo surgery.
She begged Xi Jinping to allow her father to be released on medical parole based on humanitarian principles, to go abroad for treatment, and to spend the rest of his life with his family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 1, Jinan, Shandong. CITIC Co., Ltd. persuaded the real estate developer to lower the standard and allocation privately, and the owners knelt down in the developer's building to defend their rights.
  October 2, Changsha, Hunan. The Zhongfuhang real estate project has been unfinished for three years and has yet to be delivered. The owners shouted from the rooftop: Deliver the house! Deliver the room! One owner said that because the advertising store did not allow banners to be made, there were no banners when he did not defend his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a knife attack occurred in Songjiang District, Shanghai, resulting in three deaths and 15 injuries. On October 1, a report from Songjiang District to the higher authorities on the incident was circulated online, which mentioned that the suspect Lin Weihu was from Guangxi. After coming to Hangzhou in 2012, he met Chen Xiaolong and worked on the shelves of the construction site. Later, because Chen Xiaolong owed him 30,000 to 40,000 yuan in wages and had not been paid to date, he learned that Chen Xiaolong lived in Shanghai, so he took a train from Dongguan to Shanghai on August 23 this year. Because he could not find Chen's specific address, he had to sleep on the street at night. On September 10, he contacted Chen Xiaolong to ask for his salary but failed, and then sold his mobile phone due to financial difficulties. On the day of the incident, Lin had no way to make ends meet, so he had the idea of revenge on society and chose a Walmart supermarket with many people to slash people to retaliate against society.
